status: Banned in Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Norway, Spain, Sweden and Switzerland.
info: A blue synthetic coal tar dye often used in conjunction with E102, Tartrazine, to produce various shades of green.
name: Brilliant Blue FCF (FD&C Blue 1)
foods: Can be found in tinned processed peas, dairy products, sweets and drinks.
notice: Not recommended for consumption by children. HACSG recommends to avoid it.
